name: Chain-key OCT
description: ckOCT is a cross-chain token that bridges Octopus Network’s OCT token to the Internet Computer (ICP) blockchain. It allows OCT holders to use their tokens within ICP’s decentralized applications (dApps), enabling them to participate in DeFi, staking, and governance. This integration provides OCT holders with access to ICP’s scalable and efficient smart contract ecosystem while preserving the value of their native tokens.
